ViewObject.Name: ODInvoiceVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT types.type class, ARI_UTILITIES.get_lookup_meaning('INV/CM', types.type) class_meaning, nvl(tl.sequence_num,1) term_sequence_number, trx.customer_trx_id customer_trx_id, trx.trx_number trx_number, trx.trx_date trx_date, trx.ship_to_customer_id ship_to_customer_id, trx.ship_to_contact_id ship_to_contact_id, trx.remit_to_address_id remit_to_address_id, trx.comments comments, trunc(trx.printing_last_printed) printing_last_printed, trx.invoice_currency_code invoice_currency_code, t.name term_name, trunc(trx.ship_date_actual) ship_date_actual, trx.ship_via ship_via, trx.waybill_number waybill_number, trx.purchase_order purchase_order_number, ps.due_date term_due_date_from_ps, trx.bill_to_customer_id bill_to_customer_id, trx.bill_to_contact_id bill_to_contact_id, trx.bill_to_site_use_id bill_to_site_use_id, nvl(amount_line_items_original, to_number(null)) line_amount, nvl(tax_original, to_number(null)) tax_amount, nvl(freight_original, to_number(null)) freight_amount, ps.amount_due_original total_amount, decode(sales.salesrep_id, '', '', '', '', -1, '', -2, '', -3, '', sales.name) primary_salesrep_name, trx.ship_to_site_use_id ship_to_site_use_id, t_count.number_of_terms number_of_terms, types.description, trx.finance_charges, ps.customer_id, ps.customer_site_use_id, to_char( (nvl(amount_line_items_original ,to_number(0))),fnd_currency.get_format_mask(trx.invoice_currency_code, 40 ) ) line_amount_formatted, to_char( (nvl(tax_original, to_number(0))), fnd_currency.get_format_mask(trx.invoice_currency_code, 40 ) ) tax_amount_formatted, to_char( (nvl(freight_original, to_number(0))), fnd_currency.get_format_mask(trx.invoice_currency_code, 40 ) ) freight_amount_formatted, to_char( (ps.amount_due_original), fnd_currency.get_format_mask(trx.invoice_currency_code, 40 ) ) total_amount_formatted, 'INVOICE_ACTIVITIES' ari_invoice_activity_code, ps.payment_schedule_id payment_schedule_id, ps.terms_sequence_number terms_sequence_number, ps.class clazz, NVL((select 'CROSS' from dual where exists (select 1 from ar_receivable_applications ra where ra.applied_payment_schedule_id = ps.payment_schedule_id and ra.status = 'APP' and ra.display = 'Y' and ra.amount_applied_from is not null)), 'SINGLE') cc_application_exists, NVL(tl.relative_amount,100) * (100/nvl(t.base_amount,100)) term_percent, /* Bug # 3928412 - vnb */ --Contact Phone ( select min(decode(cont_point.contact_point_type,'TLX', cont_point.telex_number, cont_point.phone_number)) from hz_contact_points cont_point, hz_cust_account_roles acct_role where acct_role.cust_account_role_id = trx.bill_to_contact_id and acct_role.party_id = cont_point.owner_table_id and cont_point.owner_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES' and nvl(cont_point.phone_line_type, cont_point.contact_point_type) = 'GEN' ) AS contact_phone, --Contact Fax ( select min(decode(cont_point.contact_point_type,'TLX', cont_point.telex_number, cont_point.phone_number)) from hz_contact_points cont_point, hz_cust_account_roles acct_role where acct_role.cust_account_role_id = trx.bill_to_contact_id and acct_role.party_id = cont_point.owner_table_id and cont_point.owner_table_name = 'HZ_PARTIES' and nvl(cont_point.phone_line_type, cont_point.contact_point_type) = 'FAX' ) AS contact_fax, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_CONTEXT, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE1, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE2, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE3, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE4, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE5, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE6, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE7, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE8, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE9, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE10, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE11, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE12, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE13, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE14, trx.INTERFACE_HEADER_ATTRIBUTE15, trx.ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, trx.ATTRIBUTE1, trx.ATTRIBUTE2, trx.ATTRIBUTE3, trx.ATTRIBUTE4, trx.ATTRIBUTE5, trx.ATTRIBUTE6, trx.ATTRIBUTE7, trx.ATTRIBUTE8, trx.ATTRIBUTE9, trx.ATTRIBUTE10, trx.ATTRIBUTE11, trx.ATTRIBUTE12, /*Added for R12 upgrade retrofit */ /* SPC formatting of attribute13 for Store Data Reg Trans, defect 6035 and 7739 */ case when length(trx.ATTRIBUTE13)=20 then substr(trx.ATTRIBUTE13,1,4) || ' / ' || substr(trx.ATTRIBUTE13,5,8) || ' / ' || substr(trx.ATTRIBUTE13,13,3) || ' / ' || substr(trx.ATTRIBUTE13,16,5) else null end ATTRIBUTE13, trx.ATTRIBUTE14, trx.ATTRIBUTE15, ps.AMOUNT_DUE_REMAINING, ps.PAYMENT_APPROVAL, FND_PROFILE.value('OIR_BPA_TEMPLATE_SELECTION') as Template_Id, (select template_type from ar_bpa_templates_vl where template_id = FND_PROFILE.value('OIR_BPA_TEMPLATE_SELECTION')) as template_type, /*Added for R12 upgrade retrofit - ODInvoiceVO*/ /* Wipro:E1356_iRec_Personalizations Created By : Raj Patel : Created Date : 21st Aug-07 */ oha.ship_to_name XX_SHIP_TO_NAME, oha.ship_to_address1 XX_SHIP_TO_ADDRESS1, oha.ship_to_address2 XX_SHIP_TO_ADDRESS2, oha.SHIP_TO_CITY || ', ' || oha.SHIP_TO_STATE|| ' ' || oha.SHIP_TO_ZIP|| ' ' || oha.SHIP_TO_COUNTRY XX_SHIP_TO_COMBINED_ADDRESS /* *** End E1356_iRec_Personalizations */ FROM ar_invoice_count_terms_v t_count, ar_adjustments com_adj, ar_payment_schedules ps, ra_terms_lines tl, ra_terms t, ra_salesreps sales, ra_cust_trx_types types, ra_customer_trx trx, /* Wipro:E1356_iRec_Personalizations Created By : Raj Patel : Created Date : 21st Aug-07 */ xx_om_header_attributes_all oha /* *** End E1356_iRec_Personalizations */ WHERE trx.cust_trx_type_id = types.cust_trx_type_id AND trx.term_id = tl.term_id(+) AND trx.term_id = t.term_id(+) AND trx.customer_trx_id+0 = ps.customer_trx_id(+) AND trx.primary_salesrep_id = sales.salesrep_id(+) AND ps.payment_schedule_id = com_adj.payment_schedule_id(+) AND 'C' = com_adj.adjustment_type(+) /* Bug 2571868: */ /* AND types.default_printing_option = 'PRI' */ AND NVL(ps.terms_sequence_number, NVL(tl.sequence_num,0)) = NVL(tl.sequence_num, NVL(ps.terms_sequence_number,0)) AND nvl(trx.term_id, -1) = t_count.term_id AND trx.customer_trx_id = :1 AND ps.terms_sequence_number = :2 AND ps.customer_id = nvl( :3 ,ps.customer_id) AND ps.customer_site_use_id = nvl( :4 ,ps.customer_site_use_id ) AND types.org_id = trx.org_id /* Wipro:E1356_iRec_Personalizations Created By : Raj Patel : Created Date : 21st Aug-07 */ AND trx.attribute14 = oha.header_id(+) /* *** End E1356_iRec_Personalizations */
